participants.name: Gelie Akhenblit
participants.title: NetworkingPhoenix CEO l Tech Startup Co-Founder l Influencer l Success Mentor l TEDx Presenter

messages.message:
Hi Brian,

Thanks for the connection!

I’m hosting a networking event and expecting 1,300 biz owners, entrepreneurs and professionals - would you be interested in coming?

… It’s on Mon, April 24th, 6PM - 9PM at the Embassy Suites Scottsdale Resort.

The event is absolutely FREE. 

You’ll just have to create a FREE profile on networkingphoeix.com, alongside 40,000 other local professionals, in order to RSVP. 

All the event details can be found here and hope to see you there!

http://tinyurl.com/j6c9yzm

Gelie

p.s. We do have very limited Table Exhibitor and Sponsorship spots. Let me know if you have any questions! 

p.p.s. The website is networkingphoenix.com and we have ~40K locals as part of our network.
